comments.author: Terry
comments.body: hey steve, what's the mileage for this one? i might join you on the hardtail, but cut short as you big ring freaks blaze ahead so i can be back in a timely manner. terry

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Hey guys: Would love to come, but I've gotta pick up my neighbor at DIA--could we ride out there instead?

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: what a glorious day... good ride. i kept looking over my shoulder waiting for the underwood/bailey express! don't know how you roadies put up w/ all that exhaust riding on US36 (cough cough) but it was a good ride nonetheless. cheers. terry

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: KIller ride! Clean pavement in Lefthand Canyon and a great all-out downhill romp from the top of Olde Stage all the way to the Greenbriar, where we could have stopped for refreshments... had we not been chasing that rabbit on the nountain bike (Terry).
